subject: United States Postal Service
body:
United States Postal Service
Post Office
421 8TH AVE
NEW YORK, NY 10001-9998
Attention Beneficiary.
This Is United State Postal Service Delivery Company ,The management
of this company, wishes to inform you that, we received a parcel
containing an ATM  Master Card valued $10.5 million USD with some
vital documents attached on it, for safety delivery to your home
address in your country, within' the next 48 hrs  as soon as we hear
back from you. This is (payment office ) I am directed to inform you
that Your payment verification and confirmations are OK.
This parcel was brought to us this morning by the ATM Card payment
office/United Nation(U.N) as your inheritance approved fund to be
delivered  to your residential home address without any delay, so
kindly reconfirm the below information, to avoid delivery your ATM
Master Card to a wrong hand.
Full names..............
Parcel owner address...........
Tel...............
Scan Copy of Your International Passport Or Driver's License
.
 We will
register your package and send you the tracking numbers before we
proceed for safety  delivery of your package as soon as you reconfirm
the required information for safety delivery, POST OFFICE is one of
the world's great success stories,  the start-up that revolutionized
the delivery of packages and information. In the past 30 years, we've
grown up and grown into a diverse family of companies as POST OFFICE
That's bigger, stronger, better than ever.
Waiting to read your e-mail on this Email ID Which is :
(
unitedstatespostal177@gmail.com
).
Yours  affectionately.
Mr Jerry Allen

subject: Re: United States Postal Service
body:
Hello Mr. Jerry Allen,

Wow, this is such exciting news! I can't believe I'm receiving an ATM Master Card valued at a million USD. That's a lot of money! 

I'm curious though, how did the United Nations come to select me for this? And why are they using an ATM card instead of a check or direct bank transfer? 

Also, you mentioned some vital documents attached to it. Could you please elaborate on what these documents are?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Joel

subject: Re: United States Postal Service
body:
To avoid much questions if you are interested and receiving your package
then you have to follow the instructions given to you, reconfirm us your
full details immediately to enable us start processing the delivery.
Thanks
Mr Jerry Allen

subject: Re: United States Postal Service
body:
Hello Mr. Jerry Allen,

Thank you for your message! I'm quite excited about this package, it's not every day one gets such a surprise. Could you please tell me more about what this process involves? And also, what kind of details do you need from me?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Joel

subject: Re: United States Postal Service
body:
We acknowledge the receipt of your email,Regarding what you stated on the
email that you need more details about this transaction,Well this is your
compensation fund that has been pending due to what is going on but glory
be to God that it has been approved by U.S Government,This fund was brought
to our office by U.S Authorities for a safety delivery to your residential
home address once you were able to comply with us,The reason why this fund
has been pending since is because of scam going on through internet,US
Government doesn't want  you to be a victim of Scam,That's why the fund has
been place on pending since 4 Years Now,After the investigation the United
Nation(UN),International Monitory Fund(IMF) And In-Conjunction with Federal
Ministry of Finance Nigeria(FMF) where the fund is originated with US
Government has approved the release of your fund,Which is an ATM Master
Card,Regarding what they stated to me personally they said the Card is
credited with the sum of $10.5 Million Dollars and with some vital
documents backing up the Fund,We are instructed by this offices to deliver
your Card to you so you are advise to forward us your full details to
enable us carry on with the process of delivery of your ATM Master Card to
your residential home address without any further delay.
Thanks
Mr Jerry Allen

subject: Re: United States Postal Service
body:
Hello Mr. Jerry Allen,

Thank you for your detailed email. It's quite exciting to hear about this pending fund and the ATM Master Card credited with such a large sum. I must say, it's all a bit overwhelming.

Could you please explain more about how this fund came to be in my name? And why has it been pending for so many years? 

Also, could you provide more information about the vital documents that are backing up the fund? What kind of documents are these?

I'm looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Joel

subject: Re: United States Postal Service
body:
Hello Mr. Jerry Allen,

Also, could you clarify what exactly these vital documents are that back up the fund? I'm just trying to understand everything clearly.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Joel

subject: Re: United States Postal Service
body:
Hello Mr. Jerry Allen,

Thank you for your detailed email. It's quite exciting to hear about this pending fund and the approval from such high-level organizations. I must say, it's a bit overwhelming.

Could you please explain more about how this ATM Master Card works? And what are these vital documents that back up the fund?

Also, could you clarify why my fund has been pending for so long? You mentioned something about scams going on, but I didn't quite understand.

I'm looking forward to hearing more about this process.

Best wishes,
Joel

subject: Re: United States Postal Service
body:
Hello Mr. Jerry Allen,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. It's quite a surprise to hear about this pending fund. I must admit, it's not every day that one hears about such a large sum of money.

Could you please provide more details about how this fund came to be? I'm curious as to why it was brought to your office specifically and what the process has been like so far.

Also, could you explain more about the role of the United Nation UN Monitory Fund, IMF, Federal Ministry of Finance Nigeria FMF, and US Government in this matter? How are they involved?

Lastly, you mentioned an ATM Master Card credited with the sum. Could you elaborate on how that works? Is it like a regular ATM card?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Joel
